about_the_game:
Embark on a unique gaming experience that delves into thought-provoking themes... this SHMUP/Visual Novel hybrid offers a compelling narrative interspersed with addictive arcade gameplay.

Play through the captivating Story Mode, immersing yourself in a journey that combines engaging storytelling with arcade excitement.

Alternatively, challenge your skills in the pure Arcade Mode, a score attack mode featuring 6 levels of intense action.

Explore CODE KNIGHT's personal space within the game, an Apartment where you can enjoy a Juke Box, Gallery, and more additional FREE CONTENT


In the digital world of Abstract Code, assume the role of CODE KNIGHT and embark on a mission to rectify the errors made by those less accountable than yourself. Engage in thrilling battles against the FINK incursion into humanities' knowledge center, CODENAME D1, and uncover the truth behind the enigmatic character known as Katie.

Please note that the game contains content that may be triggering, as it explores various sensitive topics such as social masking, and transhuman identity.

Stay connected with us on our Insta page @_ruok2000_

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Proton 8
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Abstract Code

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
